amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to adjustments to Federal funds for certain local jurisdictions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3568 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 352.

action.text: Amendment SA 3568 proposed by Senator Hyde-Smith. (consideration: CR S6233-6234; text: CR S6234) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to adjustments to Federal funds for certain local jurisdictions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3568 proposed by Senator Hyde-Smith.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3568 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 352.
